name: Bubbleberry
description: Bubbleberry is a treat for cannabis consumers on either side of the indica-sativa divide. Combining the sweet, floral taste and aroma of Bubble Gum with the all-star fruity skunkiness of Blueberry, this strain has depth while remaining immensely palatable. Enjoy this strain anytime, day or night, but understand that this strain’s pungent aroma will turn heads from 50 yards away.
attributes_title: Giggly, Hungry, Uplifted, Relaxed, Creative, Stress, Depression, Lack of Appetite, Pain, Insomnia, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Anxious, Dizzy, Headache
